title: suppouse to thank to riot for that??
body:
http://prntscr.com/osshch


So i should thank Riot for offering me every day players who just missbehave my games ,and troll pick and flame , and troll not just me and others ...

This guy seen that i wanted to pick an adc who needs protection and sustain , and he picks ziggs support ,even if he totaly had 2 games at that moment played as ziggs , 6 games all the season 2019  , and the game he played support ziggs was the 3 rd game of him playing ranked ,now believe me  ,when i say enemy had blitz and kai'sa , and he was likely leaving me open target picking that hero as support ... , played as safe as possible farmed ,leaved enemy to push  etc... .

So after a time he starts to become toxic against me , + after he finally took us to death , he manage to start and give them kills ,and get enemy grabs etc... , or stay just next to enemy not even trying to dodge enemy q .. , so i guess that's a form of grief , no pink wards ,low vision score , and he also ended the game 1/12/16 score ,because i pulled out extremly good plays , but we started bot lane like 2 5 me , and he was like 2 6 ,i had enemy extremly strong , and a vi in enemy team + lux and blitz  ,having no real sustain behind as protection , had to pull perfect plays to don't die and get catched by enemy , and even so i made a quadra kill almost penta kill ,staying full hp .

I do have experience in this game as adc , i no want to show the number ,because then you would be suspicious about my starting score and put questions.

but after the first game of him with ziggs today , he keeped play ziggs support and die much ... , so  i don't think is normal that he haven't got 14 days ban for grief in the conditions he also flamed me , and he also farmed my lane which i forgeted to tell you.

He been autofill support , but that dosn't give anyone rights to troll and grief others ,and i one happens to see same thing happening many times ,even had one game yesterday in my series , with maokai support , vs yummi and sivir , and thrust me it was like not okey , he not even coulded catch enemy to combo and help me to take them down , so we lost game in the end ... , they had a super strong rehealer ,as he had ardent censer and graham item who amplify heals/shields.

so my question , does Riot considering to start do something in that sense .

**Trolling behaviour definition should be = Anyone who grief his own team ,and put in difficulty extremly hard the fate of his team in the cases they loss should be charged with punishments... .

Let's say you have 2/6 score ,that's not a grief troll , if you stop from doing that and build tanky if it's necesary or bruiser.. , if you can do that ... , or play more safe..

But when you get 0/16 yasuo ,that dosn't anymore look like even if he would play normal ,dosn't look like is a bad game for him , as he clearly just put our team in difficulty which means our chances to win been affected.

So basically a taft definition of troll/grief , would be anyone who attempt to lower the chances of his team in winning a game , intentionally!!!! , if someone refuses to take advices and to stop from giving enemy kills ,if he is asked to play defensive and don't proceed to do that , should definetly pulled out for intentionally griefing his team as he refuse directly to play for win and just push his score higher negative, deaths  ,increasing the chances of your team to loss the game .**

I know it sound stupid ,but it must be done , i no want to see people who do what they want , over and over again ... , something have to put thinghs where these belong.


P.S : I won the game , i just played to win , because i knowed he grief+ been toxic and even if he don't deserve to win the game he will eventually reach nothing from winning that game thanks to me.
